website_summaries.verdict: A little smaller than some jersey cases, but it gives your sports memorabilia a good level of protection.
pros: Clear acrylic door on the frame will provide a bit of UV protection for your jerseys
Frame includes a lock to secure it nicely
Ships with metal brackets on the back so you can hang it on the wall securely and easily
Has interior dimensions of 30.5 by 23 inches
cons: Occasional problems with build and shipping quality

customer_reviews.title: Chipped and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I went ahead and ordered this. It arrived quickly, and it was packed very well. Unfortunately, after unpacking it carefully, I noticed a big chip in the wood. I also noticed how flimsy the case is. I guess you get what you pay for. I wish I had gotten a better quality case. If you want a case that will do the job but isn't the best quality, get this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame - easy DIY much cheaper than professional framing costs
customer_reviews.text: I bought the frame with mahogany finish to display a signed sports jersey. It was securely packaged and arrived on time. The frame looks great. I had never framed a jersey myself before but was able to do a pretty nice job in only about 15 minutes with some help from YouTube videos. This DIY project was much more cost effective than the professional framing estimates and looks great! I just placed an order for a second frame. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Edward O

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Frame
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write many reviews, but I had to let others know how much I liked this frame. Very high quality, beautiful looking and really displays the jersey nicely. I framed an autographed hockey jersey and it fit perfectly. I'm planning to frame a few more jerseys and will definitely buy again. The suggestion on the instruction sheet to use a hair dryer to help remove the protective paper was perfect. There was no residue on the glass and the paper came up with ease. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I was pricing shadow boxes to put a jersey in for my Grandson. Most I looked at that I would consider were well over $150.00. I could not believe the quality of this one for less than half the price. It is heavy duty, the hinges and lock are sturdy, the wood color is beautiful. with the hanger that comes with it the jersey looks great in the box. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen F.

customer_reviews.title: The frame itself is nice though.
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a package of busy opened silica beads. They had dispersed all over the inside of the frame and were stuck to the edges. Cleaning them was a pain. The frame itself is nice though.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moonda

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and dont buy. Terrible customer service. First order was completely broken. Reorder, case was ok but hinges are cheap junk that came in broken every time. No jersey mounting instructions, no pins as advertised. Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keep looking if you require a glass door.
customer_reviews.text: The box says "glass" but the door is plastic. I cant get the description to come up now, but if you want glass, it isnt here. Otherwise it is nice guality. Directions for removing the protective cover from plexiglass are comical. "Warn the area before you peel it."
customer_reviews.author: Kelli I.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these to hang autographed XL size hockey jerseys and they work great. They're a lighter weight than anything I was looking at, so I was nervous about quality. But, I wanted something that I didn't need to go into studs, or use drywall mounts, so I went for it with this product. They are great quality and looking really nice. Plus, my son likes being in charge of the key that keeps the jerseys locked up tight.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed for the money I spent
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the craftsmanship for this product was not as promised. The hook to hang the Jersey on was not attached straight (very obvious to the naked eye) but still the product was sent to me. I reached out to the company and they were fairly responsive but never apologiozed for the iconvenience. Unfortunately, the item I ordered was out of stock and wouldn't be able to be shipped for over a month. I happen to reach back out in about 3 weeks and----the item was in but I was never told. So they are shipping me a replacement and I will have to repack the initial item and ship it back - -still no apologize for the inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Todd Gurley Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to display a signed Todd Gurley Jersey. Keeps it clean, dust free, and locks!
customer_reviews.author: Buggs

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made, at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this display case for myself for Christmas - I have an autographed Jason Witten jersey and couldn't wait to display it. I shopped around for months, and every other case that I found was several hundred dollars more, and didn't look as nice. The display case arrived promptly. It is beautiful! Very well made, and I was pleased to see the lock on it, too. I quickly hung my Cowboys jersey in it and proudly display it on my wall. I've received several complements from friends, and when I tell them the price, they are as amazed as I was. What a fantastic value for such a beautifully made display case. I would highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: ChrissiM

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: The case does as it stated. We have had this a while. Signature has not faded on the jersey. Still looks pristine!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great case that looks more expensive than it is. Holds my XL hockey jersey very well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice case, really good product for a relatively low ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store and display my husband's high school football jersey. It's a very nice case, really good product for a relatively low price.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber_monkey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, easy on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: We got the case for my dad's signed jersey. Now we can display it beautifully in his man cave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money it look like I paid hundreds of dollars for it. My fiance loves it. It was purchase as a birthday gift for a Warren Moon jersey. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: they look great in my husbands man-cave
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 3 of these, they look great in my husbands man-cave.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality I've seen
customer_reviews.text: At that price point I did not know what to expect. Just received this beautiful case. the quality and packing was top notch. was more than I expected and the mahogany finish was super. Will buy again from this source.
customer_reviews.author: FPG

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted item, I'm very happy with this purchase. We used it for a letterman's sweater and it worked perfectly - I was afraid it'd be too thin since it's designed for jerseys, but it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Shanagan

customer_reviews.title: A great looking shadow box & easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around and learning that frame shops all charge close to $300 a shadow box, I decided to try a couple of these boxes for my husband's jerseys. I'm very pleased with the quality of the boxes and plan to frame all of his cycling jerseys in these boxes. The only adjustment I'll need to make is to pin down the jersey rather than using the hanger bar since cycling jerseys have a much smaller neck opening than football or hockey jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: Cycling enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT FOR IMPORTANT AND RARE ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: THIS CASE IS CURRENTLY HOLDING A VERY RARE JERSEY SIGNED BY 3 GREEN BAY ICONS WHO ARE ABOUT TO RETIRE. ITS VERY WELL PROTECTED. I LOVE IT AND IT FITS IT PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Liss

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered black but got brown. I just kept it but would have rather had the black one. I do like it though for a signed football jersey - much cheaper than having it professionally framed, and it looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA ALVARADO

customer_reviews.title: Looks so great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and displays my signed jersey perfectly. It gets a lot of attention when guests visit. Very clean and easy to mount.
customer_reviews.author: TW Brown, Author, Editor, and Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Real bang for your buck !
customer_reviews.text: Securely packaged.....arrived quickly ....wonderfully constructed and as depicted in the ad....sturdy and extremely clear plexiglass, could easily be mistaken for glass....accent brass locks are great looking and well made for easy access to interior. Highly recommend product. Real bang for the buck. One note: For easy removal of the protective covering on the plexiglass, if the temps are below 60, let sit inside for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fries

customer_reviews.title: Frame does not close properly
customer_reviews.text: The frame did not close properly and left a gap which lets in dust, bugs, etc.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Arrived earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Arrived earlier than expected, too. Was very favorably received as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: craftsmanship and design
customer_reviews.text: great craftsmanship and design easy to display jersey safe and secure
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Valvano

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great look
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get over how excellent this looked once we received it! The shipping was quick, the item was in perfect condition and really well packaged. Great pricing for the product. It looks AMAZING on our wall and my boyfriend is thrilled that his jersey is safe and sound inside the case!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Greco

customer_reviews.title: great quality. Adult jersey fits great in it
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged; great quality. Adult jersey fits great in it; my husband has been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: AIA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item my daughter enjoyed it to display her Lisa Fernandez jersey with autograph.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Marrujo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged and it was the most important part of my Christmas gift to my husband on our first Christmas together married. Now I’ll never get a replacement in time for Christmas. I am beyond disappointed by this.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday, he collects signed jerseys and sports memorabilia and it's absolutely gorgeous. The quality is amazing and it was a breeze to hang!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Tripp

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Everything as advertised. Very nice frame, large Stamkos jersey fits perfectly. Love the lock too, it's really perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nshock2980

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: nice frames. could be a little more sturdy in build
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: It's a good case I like the fact that it locks but ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good case I like the fact that it locks but the glass was not attached to it and it was popping out so if someone really wanted to get in they could just pull off the glass to get it, looks like it was glued, not legit at all, I'm happy about having a case for my signed jersey but a little bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jon Goergen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Only complaint is the hook doesn't have anything to hold the jersey in place and is shallow. Quality materials. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Gayton

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Used to hang my daughter's softball jersey after winning districts. Beautifully designed.
customer_reviews.author: JRusso

customer_reviews.title: Just exactly what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a family member and he seems pleased. Looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Monday

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Putting out my sons Jose Altuve autographed jersey in this frame from Santa. Took off the protective cover and their is a mosquito layered between the acrylic! No way of scrapping it off without damaging the acrylic. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: rhick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! This is a very nice display case and looks awesome. It holds my shirt perfectly. Good value and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Orksplace

customer_reviews.title: NFL Jersey Frame
customer_reviews.text: Perfect frame to display NFL Jersey! I ordered this for my daughter for x-mas. It arrived securely packaged and in perfect condition. The quality was more then I expected for this price. I have seen similar cases for twice the price locally. It was so simple to display the Jersey with the hanger inside included. The large NFL jersey fit perfectly. The front is acrylic but looks just like glass. My daughter is a very picky person and if she liked this, you will too!
customer_reviews.author: L Strebe

customer_reviews.title: Great Display Case!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality well built display case. Arrived fairly fast considering it size. Full size football jersey looks great in it but needs some folding to fit. Lock works well. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that I had to fix the plexiglass front which was pushed in when I received it. It was an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with case
customer_reviews.text: Baseball jersey fits nice inside case for the money does the job
customer_reviews.author: benito v

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a nice price
customer_reviews.text: really nice quality frame for the price. I have owned others that costed more and didn't look anything as good.
customer_reviews.author: Carla K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT for hockey jerseys.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice case but it does NOT fit hockey jerseys. This case is way too small. The warranty is only 30 days too which is bad for me because I was going to frame a hockey jersey as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but false advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in perfect condition and looks really good. However, It clearly says NHL Hockey Jersey display case - this is false advertisement. It doesn't not fit the intended jersey. I did find a use for it for my baseball jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lorhan

customer_reviews.title: Looked Like a Return
customer_reviews.text: Product looked great from pictures. Only issue was that when it was taken out of the box, I noticed scratches on the product. Not very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Marval Man

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed by the good quality for the price! Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter to display a football jersey. Shipment was quick. The case is well crafted with nice hardware for the door hinges and locks (a nice touch). It also includes a rod hanger. All in all, a very nice display case; much better quality finish than I could have built for the price. My daughter was/is thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin

customer_reviews.title: Great show case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great show case for your sports items. Packages arrived very quickly. Easy to install jersey. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes Double check and if you need it triple check what you’re going and getting because you never know if you will like it.
customer_reviews.text: Well finally arrive and was hoping to see how it will look with my favorite player . And pechless I have to say the frame give it wonderful look. The only thing I was disappointing it was the fact that obviously I purchase it because I can lock the case but as soon as I was trying to lock the case it would not work so unfortunately I could’ve just got a regular case with no lock and maybe pay less for it . Now I have to keys 🔑 that I won’t be able to use because the locks don’t work but besides that it looks great .
customer_reviews.author: Kaiika

customer_reviews.title: Jersey Display Case
customer_reviews.text: The case came in quickly and in great condition. High quality materials and a durable build. The lockable door was a great addition to the case and makes for easy maintenance. Simple to hang up and looks even better on the wall. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Charette

customer_reviews.title: Display case
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Bought for my son's 21st birthday. He wanted to display his baseball jersey and he was very thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Jersey Frame
customer_reviews.text: Great product, was shipped and received within 6 days. Holding a large men's baseball jersey and looks great. Very sturdy and well built. Will be buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, looks better than the picture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, looks better than the picture. Its not real glass but it sure looks like it while hanging on the wall. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin D.

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to display two jerseys in our downstairs "man cave". The quality of the cases and the ease of use were great! easy to put the jerseys in, and they look fantastic. And, they arrived in two business days! Couldn't be more pleased with the cases for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Celene701

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what i was looking for! it was a great price for the product... very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: james t armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Ronnie Lott jersey+ this frame = theres no works to describe it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing frame once i opened it up i knew how good it was going to loook! my jersey was a mitchell and ness ronnie lott jersey size 54 i belive and it fit almost perfect it didnt bother me at all that my jersey was to long by maybe 4 inches just fold it up a bit and it was a beauuty my brotha!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I was looking to display my son's ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I was looking to display my son's state championship lacrosse jersey & it looks perfect! Well packed & arrived without any problems. Stylish presentation. Well made product. Very pleased overall!
customer_reviews.author: Dena R. Koser-Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The frame is perfect. Just what I had in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Rovi

customer_reviews.title: I love this display case
customer_reviews.text: I love this display case. It came exactly as promised and looks awesome hanging on the wall with my prized football jersey inside.
customer_reviews.author: Brad VanZante

customer_reviews.title: A great frame for jerseys
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Way beyond my expectations and a great price! I framed a youth hockey jersey and it was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Olson

customer_reviews.title: Really great looking display case - perfect for extra large jerseys ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great looking display case - perfect for extra large jerseys and displaying signed memorabilia. Nothing cheap looking about it, for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: GJS

customer_reviews.title: ... schedule-product was as it was described and worked out fine for what we wanted to use it for however ...
customer_reviews.text: product was delivered on the last day of the schedule-product was as it was described and worked out fine for what we wanted to use it for however one of the hinge clips had come off
customer_reviews.author: chuck nichols

customer_reviews.title: hanger was great. Put a hockey jersey in it
customer_reviews.text: Just as ordered, hanger was great. Put a hockey jersey in it. If you want to see more of the jersey you need a larger one but I thought it fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: phillip t kraese

customer_reviews.title: The case looks great I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The case looks great I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a display case for a sports jersey etc.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous--this is my second. Perfectly packed no damage ever--love them

customer_reviews.title: Hall of fame jacket preserved
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for valentine day, it arrive on time it was secure nothing was chipped broken etc. the size and price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tammy spivey

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The frame looks better in person than in the on-line picture. Good quality for the money spent. Serves its intended purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks fabulous. Its plexiglass so be careful when cleaning it but it looks like glass over all. The hanger works well but I designed a foam board for it so it rigid and tight around the back and I could pin if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kritternugget

customer_reviews.title: ... used this as a shadow box and it worked great. Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a shadow box and it worked great. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme M Yeo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame to hang an autographed Bruins jersey. It was well packed, shipped, and was well made. I had a custom made frame built for another hockey jersey that is much bigger but for the money this frame was a GREAT deal, I'm actually considering buying more of them. When I got the frame I was actually surprised that the lock even worked haha. So although it's not as big as my custom frame my Bruins jersey looks awesome in it, if it was just a 'little' bit bigger it would be perfect. Highly recommend !!!!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: It would have been better if it came with the filler for the jersey. Other than that it looks great and my son loved it on his wall.
customer_reviews.author: gang13green

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: No surprises. It arrived as expected. To be displayed with my sons hockey jersey That is about it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rich G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for Valentines Day for his Bengals Jersey he wanted to hang, and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LHibbitt

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Display Case
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to other reviews, my decision to buy this product was easy to make. I proudly display my team jersey (Lakers) on this product. Looks great, great price. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: JVfromCali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all. the frames came on time and really look good
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DiLeo

customer_reviews.title: Well made display
customer_reviews.text: But it's to small for a hockey jersey. A sm. or med. sized short sleeve jersey would display very well.
customer_reviews.author: DONNA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the shadow box was better then expected. looks great !
customer_reviews.author: Harry Falero

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: The display case was exactly as advertised. Good quality and value considering the price. Would purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: spyder

customer_reviews.title: Great*
customer_reviews.text: The item is perfect. It fits a 2XL jersey great! Amazing price and perfect product.This frame is the absolute best for a jersey and my husband loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product. Great quality, easy hanging and they look fantastic in our lobby.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sobeck

customer_reviews.title: highly recomend them!
customer_reviews.text: great display case at a great price! will refer anyone looking for one I love supporting a small american business

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: An awesome display case, would recommend to anyone who wants a high quality/value product without spending an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly, no damage, was packed well and looks great on the wall. Could not ask for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hart

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe jersey display case
customer_reviews.text: This an amazingly well built, beautiful dislay case. I did a lot of surfing and shopping and nothing on the web or locally could come close to the quality or price. When I bought it, I was delighted to find that it was exactly as pictured. These people do a great job- I just don't know how they can possibly make it any better of less expensive. If I get lucky enough to have more jerseys autographed, this is the only one I would want to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ewolek

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Jersey Frame display case with hanger for my son. I was pleasantly surprised. The frame is very well made and the jersey fit with no problem. I am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: I have accumulated a lot of these frames for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have accumulated a lot of these frames for my hockey jersey collection. The price is very reasonable for the construction quality. One thing, though, is that larger hockey jerseys (I have mostly CCM size Medium) may not fit quite right due to the long sleeves or fold properly if they have shoulder patches sewn in.
customer_reviews.author: Janeen Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality For A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I have to totally agree with Surfin79. The photo of this display case simply doesn't do it justice. My husband was speechless when he opened it yesterday. This is a high-end, professional display case; it's beautifully wrought and very expensive-looking. So glad we went with it...it was carefully packed extremely well, an early indicator that there's pride of product on the part of the manufacturer. We followed the directions using a hair dryer to remove the safety wrap and it's up on the wall. Oh, you can spend a lot more money. But why would you want to? FIVE STARS for a great price and excellent service from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cospringsliving

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is light weight and good material, I was able to hang the frame with 3 push pins. Very easy to set up, it took me about 30 mins to remove (peel) the paper covering the acrylic, but I was extra careful, and the jersey can be hanged with a tube which is included! If I get a jersey worth framing again, I'll surely be getting this frame for it!
customer_reviews.author: Billy S. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: The display is of good quality and I like it overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to display my grandfather's military uniform. The display is of good quality and I like it overall, but it's not very deep. The shirt and coat collar on the uniform are too thick and the door doesn't close properly. I'm going to keep it, but it does seem to be best suited only for jerseys.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful display jersey case excellently crafted
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely best valued jersey shadowbox for the money. My sons jerseys look absolutely amazing in these boxes. I love the fact that it comes with a key and a lock to protect your prize jersey. I like the fact that the plexiglass has a filter built into it to protect your jersey from the sun. This box is well constructed and would look great on anyone's wall.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Brokaw Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The boyfriend loved it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my boyfriend for his birthday so that he can finally hang up his signed basketball jersey. I was so happy when it arrived because it had gotten there in one piece (packaged well) and it was super classy. The wood had a nice tint, the lock was a nice addition, and it really was an elegant statement piece to display such an important relic. I feel like it really added value to the jersey.
customer_reviews.author: cgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get the jersey in and to hang
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two for two different sized hockey jerseys. They are very well made. Easy to get the jersey in and to hang. They look great on my office wall!! I would recommend any one buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Sending it back - frame cracked along the wood at the bottom and acrylic screen pulling up. Box wasn't damaged so assume it was sent that way, poor quality control. Nice product otherwise - looks pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice case. Arrived just as the picture shown! i am using it to hang a bunch of Royals World Series gear and had to purchase some cork to place behind the items but if your just hanging a jersey it has everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Blake w

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shadow box
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shadow box of all the ones I had purchased before from a private dealer next to my home town, this display case is hands down the best i have ever purchased and the price is unbeliveable. I will be purchasing more of these in the near future to add to my wall of fame in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Mac Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great case for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The case was delivered to me to an overseas address and it got to me before the expected delivery date so I was very happy about that. The case was packaged very well to protect the "wood" and "glass." It holds my jersey perfectly in place and displays the signature without any special maneuvering. Overall, I would have no problems buying this product again and would recommend this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: edward woodcock IV

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it
customer_reviews.text: It is really great product easy to instal I might buy another one
customer_reviews.author: jaime D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful frames came packaged perfectly easy to hang as well
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

product_meta.title: Ultra Clear PRO UV Basketball, Football, Hockey Jersey Frame Uniform Display Case, Lockable (JC01)
product_meta.description: One word: "Remarkable." The picture speaks for itself. This jersey display case is made from hand selected hardwood. Repeated sanded to achieve smooth and elegant appearance. A great way to showcase an autographed or memorable football, baseball or Hockey jersey. Black matted background with jersey-friendly-material to creates a fancy and elegant contrast. The display case has a Hinged acrylic door cover to protect from dust and damage. Brass hinges, door latches, and wall brackets to hang (Wall mounted). Hanger rod included. No assembly required.
feature_bullets: Mahogany Finish. Solid wood frame and door, ULTRA CLEAR UV protection Acrylic door
felt background, Hanger included, with LOCK
Metal brackets on the back for hanging.
MAHOGANY finish for the frame. Measures 31.5"H X 24"W X 2"D. Inside: 30.5"H X 23"W X 1.25"D
Jersey NOT included. No assembly required.
